name: Incentive Solutions
tag_list: incentive-programs, reward-programs, loyalty-programs, incentive-travel, employee-incentives, sales-incentives, channel-incentives
overview:
Incentive Solutions is a full-service business incentive company offering turnkey, online, points-based reward programs, the full spectrum of incentive travel and event planning services, and debit card reward programs.

Incentive Solutions’ points programs run on RewardTrax, a Web-based technology which delivers a client-branded program Website for participant use and Web-based administration tools for program management and reporting (program performance, budget, participant information, etc.).

Program participants earn points which can be redeemed at the program Web site for a wide variety of travel, merchandise and event ticket rewards. Millions of reward choices are available, and are presented to participants with real-time price and availability information.

Incentive Solutions programs are all supported with a complete set of services, from program design, to account management, to reward fulfillment, program communications, and more.
